actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the inpatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits, and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits and for purposes of hospital insurance benefits for uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible, at their 1974 levels.

summary.text: Revises title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to freeze the impatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits, and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits (and for purposes of hospital insurance benefits for uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible), at their 1974 levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the inpatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits, and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits and for purposes of hospital insurance benefits for uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible, at their 1974 levels.
